name: insomnia-plugin-sse

insomnia.name: sse
insomnia.description: Perform SSE requests using any HTTP method (GET, POST, etc.).

description: This plugin allows you to make SSE (Server-Sent Events) requests directly in Insomnia, including support for POST, PUT, and other HTTP methods.
author: Alejandro Latorre <alej669@gmail.com>
